unnormalised: Arre yaar, Civil Law mhannllear kitli doka dukhi! Mhojea chacheachi property-chi takrar chol'li vochchhi sumar 10 vorsham! Case district court-an file keli 02/03/2014-ak, ani fokot poilech mhoineant nirakaran ailem. Advocate Sharma-n taka Rs. 50,000 ghettlim fokot poile file kortach. Asha korta konnakuch oxem jhanjhat bhogunk poddonam.
normalised: Arre yaar, Civil Law mhantlear kitli dokdukhi! Mhojea chachak propertiesh sambondit zhogddem choltalem sumar dha vorsa meren! To case district courtan dusrea march don hazar choddan dakholl kelo, ani fattlimchya mhoinyan to suttt'tto. Advocate Sharman taka fokot suruvatichi filing korpak rupia pon'nas hazar ghetele. Umm'ed asa ani konnakuch he jhanjhat bhogunk poddchina.
text: Arre yaar, Civil Law mhannllear kitli doka dukhi! Mhojea chacheachi property-chi takrar chol'li vochchhi sumar 10 vorsham! Case district court-an file keli 02/03/2014-ak, ani fokot poilech mhoineant nirakaran ailem. Advocate Sharma-n taka Rs. 50,000 ghettlim fokot poile file kortach. Asha korta konnakuch oxem jhanjhat bhogunk poddonam.
